meanings.definition: A person or animal that nibbles.
meanings.sent1: The little nibblers in the garden enjoy eating small bits of lettuce.
meanings.sent2: The rabbits are known as nibblers because they like to nibble on carrots.
meanings.sent3: The nibblers in the petting zoo are always looking for tasty treats.
meanings.sent4: The nibblers in the park seem to have an endless appetite for grass.
meanings.sent5: The tiny nibblers in the field make cute munching sounds as they eat.

meanings.definition: A tool used for cutting sheet metal.
meanings.sent1: The worker used the nibblers to cut the metal into precise shapes.
meanings.sent2: The nibblers are essential for creating clean edges on the sheet metal.
meanings.sent3: The loud noise of the nibblers cutting through metal echoed in the workshop.
meanings.sent4: The nibblers sliced through the metal like a hot knife through butter.
meanings.sent5: The nibblers left smooth edges on the sheet metal after each cut.
